See my reply here to a team with the same issue – should clean up my answer there but in short I tested this by mapping out which directions the robot would go if the right motors (which are inverted in code) were going the wrong way and it lines up with the “rotated joystick” thing. Ran the robot with flashed values and tested by removing configuration from the code and it worked correctly.
